transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Good morning.

Executive: Good morning, sir.

Customer: Sir, Shadaab Bolandia, Marts account manager, sir.

Executive: Kahan se?

Customer: Shadaab Bolandia, Marts account manager.

Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.

Customer: Sir, mera discussion hua tha na aapke saath video call pe.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: To sir, iska matlab buyleads ka matlab aa hi nahi rahi kya aapke kaam ki buyleads?

Executive: Yaar, woh humare hisab se nahi aa rahi hai woh cheeze na, maine aapko kuch send bhi kiya tha.

Customer: To wahan pe sir jaise yeh aluminium profile roofing sheet near Chandigarh 91 mm 400 square feet yeh kam hai.
373 square meter.
Color coated roof, ji sir main cheez pata hai kya hai, aisa nahi hai badi buyleads hamare paas jaise 1500 square feet ki jo badi buyleads hamare paas generate ho rahi hai na, woh ho ja rahi hai sold out. Reason yeh hai.
Han ji sir, aur isse pehle bhi maine aapse bola tha ki sir agar aap main cheez aapke paas direct call aur inquiry ka bhi thoda si woh hai. Call jitni buyleads aap consume karenge na, utni hi zyada aapke paas calls and inquiries aayengi. Haan ab hum jab se plan purchase kiya hai September se, September humne teen buyleads purchase kari aur October humne chhe buyleads purchase kari. Aur hamare paas sir on a monthly basis 72 something buyleads aati hai. Agar hum sir 72 mein three buyleads, six buyleads consume karenge na, to sir hamare paas itna business aane ki opportunity nahi ho payegi. Ab jaise November hamare paas abhi tak paanch call aayi hai. Paanch call mein humne do call uthaye aur teen call miss kar diya hai. Ji sir jo buyer ki call aati hai, woh to sir woh hote hai na interested hi hote hai. Ab yeh sir aluminium sheet se yeh Anshika Rana kaun hai sir? 23 November 2025 ko rating diya hai inhone.

Executive: Hmm, kahan pe hai yeh?

Customer: Dera Bassi Industrial Area, Punjab.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Inki rating yahan pe rating jo available hai matlab five ki rating available hai. 23 November 2025 ki Dera Bassi Industrial Area Punjab ka Anshika Rana ke naam se, do din pehle ki rating hai yeh.

Executive: Achha, kitni rating hai yeh?

Customer: Sir, five rating hai sir.

Customer: To inse sir deal hui thi kya?

Executive: Uh, pata nahi yaar, mujhe yeh confirm karna padega, waise deal hoti thi woh.

Customer: Nahi, main cheez jab deal hoti hai na, tabhi unke paas deal hoti hai ya to baat hoti hai, tabhi hum unke paas yeh jo hai na, rating ka wahan pe option aata hai. Otherwise rating ka option unke paas nahi aata. Same yeh sir 15 October 2024 ki jo aluminium sheet 1011 ki hai padi hui. Vishal Puniya Rohtak Haryana ki hai sir.

Customer: Hmm.

Customer: Yeh matlab yeh abhi ek ek mahina purani hai matlab do din purani ek yeh hai aur ek mahina purani yeh hai. Sir, kuch aisa kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai na ki koi aata hai connect karke connect karne ke baad woh aake purchase karke chala jata hai aur hame pata bhi nahi chalta ki IndiaMART se woh aaya tha. Jiska paas mein hota hai ya to badi quantity mein lena hota hai, woh aapki manufacturing plant dekhta hai, plant dekhne ke baad aapko direct connect karke woh aake purchase karke chala jata hai. Haan aur hame pata nahi chalta ki usme woh IndiaMART se aaya tha ki direct aaya tha. Kyunki sir hamara jo hai.

Executive: Toh wohi bhi hai na queries aap khud dekh lo kitni kuch aa rahi hai.

Customer: Haan IndiaMART se bata to raha hu sir aapke paas inquiries jo hai.

Executive: Mujhe yeh batao isko hum improvise kaise kar sakte hai aur kya cheeze hum isko kar sakte hai?

Customer: Sir, isme dekho ek do cheeze hai jaise maine aapko yeh bataya tha ki buyleads ka jitni zyada aap buyleads consume karenge na, utni hi zyada aapke paas calls and inquiries ka flow badhega. Aur dusri cheez yeh hai ki abhi hum present time pe basic plan pe baithe hue hai. Haan basic plan pe yeh hota hai sir yahan pe kuch trusted wagera yahan pe certificate kuch hota nahi hai. Trusted member hota nahi hai aur hamare portal client mein achhe khase log hai sir jo aapse purchase karte hai na, woh log sir trusted leke baithe hue hai. Matlab jo 50-50 kg ek ek quintal do do quintal deal kar lete hai, woh yahan pe trusted leke baithe hai aur jo buyer hota hai sir woh trusted supplier pe zyada bharosa karta hai. Aap hi honge sir agar kabhi jayenge yeh jaise aap kabhi helmet purchase karenge, to usme dekhenge zaroor ki ISI mark ka hai ki nahi.

Customer: To hole mark dete dete hai ki hai ki nahi. Sir same cheeze.

Executive: Uska bhi concern nahi hai because mere ko pehle usse to main satisfied hu ki jo leads aa rahi hai woh sahi ho. Wohi nahi aa rahi hai woh to pehle aur bhi cheeze dekhni hai.

Customer: Ji sir.

Executive: Pehle sir proper jo aa rahi hai cheeze jitni bhi queries hai usme se to kuch nikle. Fir aage ko bhi dekhe na.

Customer: Haan aur uske baad sir aap kabhi buyleads pe jayiyega na, to buyleads pe ek option hota hai, haan fast lead ka. To wahan pe sir sold out ka jo hota hai na, jo badi lead hai usme I am interested mark kar diya kariye. Jo badi lead jo sold out ho jati hai, uspe I am interested mark kar diya kariye. To usse I am interested mark karne se yeh hoga jaise hi woh buylead generate hogi na, turant aapke portal pe land hogi. Jo jo waisi badi buylead jab generate hogi, woh turant aapke portal pe land hogi. Usse fayda yeh hoga ki sir jo badi buylead hogi na, woh hum bhi consume kar payenge.

Executive: Mujhe ek baar bata do Google Meet session pe kaise karna hai yeh.

Customer: Dekhiye.

Executive: Kya cheez sir?

Executive: Ek baar Google Meet session pe aap explain kar do isse.

Customer: Sir, thoda sa aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai, kat kat ke.

Executive: Main yeh keh raha hu usme se Google Meet ka session rakh lo uspe explain kar do kaise karna hai.

Customer: Theek hai, abhi hai sir aapke paas time?

Executive: Haan haan kar lo phir.

Customer: Theek hai, main aapko sir ek Google Meet jo hai link share kar diya hu. Haan dekhiye aapki mail ID pe receive hua hoga.

Executive: Abhi is ID pe kiya aapne?

Customer: Haan sir jo yahan pe dmm@birgoaluminium.com ispe mail aaya hoga aapka.

Executive: Abhi aaya nahi hai.

Customer: Sir, refresh kariye aa gaya hoga, sir mere paas show hone laga ki aapko receive ho gaya.

Customer: Aisa to nahi ki phone on hai iski wajah se nahi aa raha woh?

Executive: Phone sabhi bhi net net band rehta hai. Laptop pe on hai.

Customer: Achha laptop mein, haan refresh kariye sir.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Sir, isko call pe disconnect kar do, wahan pe main aapko baat karta hu.

Executive: Theek hai sir.

Customer: Wahan pe aawaz aati hai na sir laptop pe sun.

Executive: Nahi nahi phone mat karna disconnect, phone pe baat kar lo.

Customer: Ji sir.

Customer: Ji ji.

Customer: Ab yahan pe sir yeh dekhiye yeh side pe jayiye, right side pe.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Balance ke upar sabse yahan pe likha hoga. Sir Himachal Pradesh nahi yahan pe balance ke upar click karo. Haan iske upar iske upar aao.

Executive: Yahan pe?

Customer: Iske upar sir just upar yeh. Haan yeh.

Customer: Ab yeh hamare paas fast valid hai jo hame yahan pe matlab yahan pe ek lakh ke upar ka filter laga lijiye.

Customer: Ab yahan pe niche dekhiye scroll kariye aap.

Customer: Scroll kariye scroll.

Customer: To jaise yeh hai blue aluminium.

Customer: To plain silver pe hum dekh lete hai isko abhi aapko niche dikhenge woh.

Customer: Ab jaise yeh hai yeh hai na to yeh ab isme se hai quantity yahan pe three sheets ka add hai. Lekin ab jaise yahan pe yahan pe yeh metro sheet hai na isme hum deal karte hai?

Executive: Yeh dekho sir abhi yeh hai na iske andar problem yeh aati hai quantity dekho. Quantity itna kam hai isme kya hai ki karo isme.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Expresses concern over ratings from unknown contacts.

- Dissatisfied with the current business opportunities.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a Google Meet link for assistance.

- Executive explained how to mark interested buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to explain process via Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, ratings, google meet, inquiries
